attributes.action: Stand down now before he destroys our country completely..we never voted for you & we dont want you!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our country is in the grip of econmical crisis with the housing & construction industries suffering their worst slump in years & no doubt others will soon follow,unemployment is rising daily & oil & food prices are through the roof,our streets are ruled by yobs & our children are killing each other daily & what does our prime minister do to help us? he tells us to " be more frugal with our food" if it was'nt so serious it would be funny.Do the one decent thing of your premiership & stand down now - we never voted for you & we never wanted you,the people have no faith in you whatsoever & you are destroying our country utterly with your useless policys & your refusing to listen to the people as well as taxing us to hell & back,JUST GO!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
